Syntactic Structure & Grammatical Form: Fixed clause with modal verb structure
Figurative Meaning: You might regret it later or suffer consequences

First Example Sentence: Nomo du dat, bambai yu garram bel!
Second Example Sentence: Bambai yu garram bel la det ting yu bin du.
Third Example Sentence: Im bin warn im bratha – 'Bambai yu garram bel'.

Second Example Sentence: Im la langa bush la diswan.
Third Example Sentence: Nomo worry 'im, 'im la langa bush still.

Third Example Sentence: Sometime yu garram gurr la stupid liklik ting.

Third Example Sentence: Im smalwan, ai nomo bin kemp la wa im tok.
